txtout: Hello, How can i Help you?
At what time do you have to take your medicine? write your time as HH:MM PM/AM
You have to take your medicine at [time].

riddles.question: How many months of the year have 28 days?
It belongs to you, but your friends use it more. What is it?
If you dont keep me, Ill break. What am I?
I have a tail and a head, but no body. What am I?
